overview: Three siblings, brother Dinu and two sisters Anu and Buri meet on a seashore one morning after their mother's death. They reminiscence about their mother and her relentless journey in search of 'home'. Gradually as  they dwell  through their personal memories of 'mother' they unknowingly enter into unknown dark zones of mother and  their own lives. The spirits of their ancestors too become part of their stories as the two sisters preform their memories. Dreams, fantasies, memories and reality starts to overlap to form a complex image of 'mother' in search of home.

production_companies.name: Film and Television Institute of India

tagline: Only the one living on the border  Will create a land
title: Songs from a Far Away Land
